import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext'; import { getDatabase, ref, set, child, get } from "firebase/database"; export default function Clients() { const [clients, setClients] = useState({}) const { user, setUser } = useContext(UserContext) const addClient = () => { const db = getDatabase() set(ref(db, `/${user.uid}/clientid/formulas`), { date: 'march 5, 2023', notes: 'balayage: /17 magma + 30vol 1:1.15 30min with heat', photos: 'https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1004495634113511607/1107117378950668368/traviistea_stunning_hair_models_avant_garde_haircuts_mugler_pho_ea15d949-3a5b-4583-b0d9-9b475cc0a848.png' }) } return (
{/* head */} {/* row 1 */} {/* foot */}
Client Job
Hart Hagerty
United States
 Zemlak, Daniel and Leannon
Desktop Support Technician
Client Job
) }
